name: Cycletour Western Islands And Jordaan Quarter
description: Nowadays you can hardly imagine parts of Amsterdam that are as lovely and popular as the Western Islands and the Jordaan quarter. But it wasn’t always like that! The Western Islands and the Jordaan quarter belong together, a little bit like family does. They were both founded in the 17th century to accommodate artisans and seaman, but its houses a nd reputation rapidly deteriorated in the centuries that followed. Now however they belong to one of Amsterdam’s most cherished and beautiful neighbourhoods. Join us in this tour to discover more.
